description:
One adventure has come to an end. This moment right now is the beginning of a brand new journey!
Aladdin, Alibaba, and Morgiana go their separate ways after spending time together in Sindria to develop their own strengths, make new friends and prepare for what is coming.
Note: The first and second episodes were pre-aired at a special event on 22.09.2013, regular TV broadcast started on 06.10.2013.

REGULAR.description:
Citizens of Sindria hold a festival, celebrating their victory. Prince Hakuryu is preparing to leave Sindria. Sinbad tells Aladdin about the other magis. Princess Dunya refuses to speak to anyone except Aladdin. Dunya is affected by the Dark Metal Vessel.
Source: crunchyroll

Aladdin decides to go on a journey on his own to study magic at the Magnostadt Academy. Sinbad takes on Kogyoku as his sparring partner. Hakuryu wants Sinbad to assist him in destroying the Kou Empire. Hakuryu and Morgiana tell each other their stories.
Source: crunchyroll

Sinbad and the Eight Generals say their farewells to Aladdin, Morgiana and Hakuryu before they set off on a journey on a ship. Hakuryu seems to have feelings for Morgiana. Do they know that Alibaba is on the same ship as them?
Source: crunchyroll

The pirates, led by Orba, attack the ship and using a Magic Tool, they capture Aladdin. After being taken to an island full of children, Aladdin meets a mysterious woman named Aum Madaura. Alibaba, Morgiana and Hakuryu set out to rescue their friend.
Source: crunchyroll

Alibaba, Morgiana and Hakuryu are now on the island where Aladdin is being held hostage by Madaura. Madaura is not worried about the situation, since she has plans for them. Will she manage to hypnotize Aladdin and his friends, using her Magic Tool?
Source: crunchyroll

Madaura and the pirates are captured by the Actian Navy. Hakuryu recalls his childhood and his mother. He sets off to leave town without saying goodbye to his friends, but he wants to have a private conversation with Morgiana first.
Source: crunchyroll

The three friends enjoy their last night together and part ways in the morning with the promise to reunite.  Aladdin soon learns the demands of travelling long distance by magic turban and gets a ride on a private carriage with a surprising occupant!
Source: crunchyroll

Aladdin finally enrolls at the Magnoshutatt Academy. He takes the Kodor exam but the result is not satisfying. It`s the best he can do without any help from the Rukh. Will Aladdin survive the physically demanding training and start the magic lessons?
Source: crunchyroll

After his troublesome trip, Alibaba arrives at the Leam Empire to undergo training to become a gladiator. He is not accepted to Shambal Ramal`s Gladiator Training School, and now he has to prove himself. Will Alibaba be able to join the other gladiators?
Source: crunchyroll

At last, Alibaba is facing his first opponent as a gladiator in the Colosseum. However, since he is informed by Shambal that he can`t use magic during the battle, Alibaba has to prove his sword skills to survive the fangs of the great ape Garda!
Source: crunchyroll

Morgiana arrives at her homeland, Katarg, in hopes of finding other Fanalis. She runs into some familiar faces from the past. They tell her that the Elder of the Tran Village could help her find Fanalis. Will it be a journey with no return for Morgiana?
Source: crunchyroll

Princess Kogyoku thinks that her brother Kouen will be the next emperor of the Kou Empire. Kouen tells his siblings about his thoughts on the future of the world and asks Hakuryu to lend him his power. Who will be the next emperor now?
Source: crunchyroll

Students at the Magnoshutatt Academy think that Aladdin will be chosen as the top student. However, a very peculiar student named Titus Alexius graduates at the top of the class. A magical battle between them is decided to take place in front of everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ティトス・アレキウス

REGULAR.description:
Titus apologizes to Aladdin. They decide to become friends and help each other out. Aladdin, Titus and Sphintus set out to explore Magnoshutatt with their 2nd Level of Citizenship badges, and they try to find the place called the 5th District.
Source: crunchyroll

After being caught in the 5th Level Authorization District; Aladdin, Titus and Sphintus are brought before Mogamett. Surprisingly, he forgives the inflitrators and gives a lecture to the students, explaining the difference between magicians and the goi.
Source: crunchyroll

Titus blames Mogamett for the misery of the goi living in the 5th Level Authorization District. Mogamett advises Titus to take Marga above ground. Meanwhile, Aladdin suspects that Mogamett isn`t quite the person he portrays himself to be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le temps qu`il me reste à vivre

REGULAR.description:
Titus explains his origins to Mogamett and confesses that he is envious of humans. Scheherazade talks to Mogamett and expresses her desire to have Magnoshutatt as a province of the Leam Empire. Will Magnoshutatt go into battle with the Leam Empire?
Source: crunchyroll

Leam Empire`s soldiers arrive at Magnoshutatt under Lady Scheherazade`s orders. The soldiers are under the impression that Magnoshutatt is a pathetic little country. However, magicians of the Academy City will not surrender without putting up a fight!
Source: crunchyroll

Magicians of Magnoshutatt are set to stop the Fanalis and the Leam soldiers from advancing further on their soil. Will Aladdin be able to retreive his powers in the midst of all this chaos?
Source: crunchyroll

Aladdin steps forward to defend Magnoshutatt, which draws the attention of the remaining Leam forces.  Will he be able to stand alone against the power of their metal vessel users?
Source: crunchyroll

Lord Mogamett doesn`t seem to be worried about the Leam and the Kou forces invading Magnoshutatt. He wants the goi to sacrifice their lives for their country, even though they expect the magicians to protect them. Will Alibaba be involved in this battle?
Source: crunchyroll

The Black Djinn continue to wreak havoc, forcing Alibaba to seek an unlikely ally. Scheherazade, defending the Leam ships, can’t help but worry for Titus as he makes a difficult decision in the remaining time they have left.
Source: crunchyroll

In an effort to stop the battle, Aladdin asks Kouen to pull back his troops. Meanwhile, to prevent the world from being destroyed, the Djinns want the Dark Spot sealed off. Will Aladdin and his allies be able to destroy the Medium?
Source: crunchyroll

While Aladdin, Alibaba, and their allies try to stop the Medium, a creature appears. Taking away Rukh from anything, the creature seems to be invincible. However… there are some surprise guests who arrive at this battle…
Source: crunchyroll

Will the allies be able to stop their common enemy in this final episode?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: マギ The kingdom of magic
